useCase.name: Conduct Research Interviews

preconditions.precondition: The researcher has identified the criteria for participants.

successEndConditions.condition: The final list of interview participants is confirmed.

useCase.trigger: Researcher initiates the process of conducting interviews.

mainSequence.step: Recruitment Tool queries potential participants in the Database.
Database returns a list of potential participants to the Recruitment Tool.
Researcher reviews the list of potential participants.
Recruitment Tool sends invitations for interviews to Educators and Science Influencers.
Recruitment Tool reports responses (accept/decline) to the Researcher.
Recruitment Tool confirms the interview schedule with the participants.
Recruitment Tool finalizes the list of interview participants.
